import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {FormBuilder, FormGroup} from "@angular/forms" @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit { public loginForm!: FormGroup constructor(private formBuilder : FormBuilder){} ngOnInit(): void { this.loginForm = this.formBuilder.group({ email:[''], password:[''] }) } login(){ } }

Please enter email & password !!
We'll never share your email with anyone else.
